lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers welcomed the Bank of Spain's decision to raise the reserve requirement for banks and savings banks, saying it reflected the socialist government's determination not to ease up in the fight against inflation despite the painful social effects of four years of austerity.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Demonstrations by workers, students and farmers, whose demands essentially involve more government spending, have become an almost daily occurrence.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But bankers said the high real interest rates on offer now -- around eight pct for overnight funds -- was attracting money from abroad, strengthening the peseta and making Spanish exports less competitive.
